*[[Shops#Alola|Shops]] }} ==Description== The '''Beast Ball''' is a type of [[Poké Balls|Poké Ball]] that is used solely to catch Ultra Beasts. It will attempt to catch an Ultra Beast according to the player's current Poké Ball selector setup. ==Details== A specialized Poké Ball to capture Pokémon with, it can catch Ultra Beasts. Beast Balls can't capture wild Pokémon other than Ultra Beasts. When the Beast Ball is equipped the player will only catch Ultra Beasts and all other types of Pokémon will be ignored. And no other Poké Balls will be used against Ultra Beasts. For example if the player has selected a Beast Ball for already caught Pokémon and a Master Ball for new shines, if the player finds a common Kartana it will be caught with the Beast Ball but if they find a shiny Kartana it won't be caught and instead will be ignored. ==Acquisition== ===Shops=== {{ItemPrice/head‎|Pokéballs}} |- {{ItemPrice|[[Shops#Alola: Locations & Items|Roadside Motel]]|500 {{questpoints}}}} |} |} {{Pokéballs}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Poké Balls]]
